synopsis:
This is the story of a friendship between a boy named Taro and the mysterious Wonder-kun, using "the first dream of the New Year" as a motif. This work, also combining camera-shot scenes and animation, was broadcast by NHK for kids staying at home watching TV over the New Year holidays. Guided by Wonder-kun, Taro departs on a space trip searching for adventure.
(Source: Official Site}

title.jp: Wonder-kun no Hatsu Yume Uchuu Ryokou
